H0.text: Hewer is an old occupational name for which trade. Woodcutter

H1.text: Hewer is an old occupational name for which trade. Stonemason

H2.text: Hewer is an old occupational name for which trade. Carpenter

H3.text: Hewer is an old occupational name for which trade. Miner

A4.text: Hewer (also known as 'cake' or 'pickman'), whose job was to hew the rock.
